name: CUBER-Windows
description:
Cuber is Developed by ATG Studios, which is Platformer Based Shooting Game.

Fight Till your Last Breathe.

Be the one to Survive from the Enemies and their Deadly Guns.

Go Shoot... Shoot... Shoot...

You Support me Through Patreon :-https://www.patreon.com/atg360 Follow me on Instagram :- https://www.instagram.com/atg.studios/ Follow me on Twitter :- https://twitter.com/GamesAbhi Subscribe The Channel For More :- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCakLBK8ClT89plKRQNrps1A

Can be Played On PC, Mac and Linux

Developed in India

Develop By an Indian
